text: S. M. Siddaiah is an Indian politician who was the Member of the Indian National Congress for the Chamarajanagar constituency of Karnataka between 1957–71. ==References== Category:Indian National Congress politicians from Karnataka Category:People from Chamarajanagar district Category:2nd Lok Sabha members Category:3rd Lok Sabha members Category:4th Lok Sabha members Category:Lok Sabha members from Karnataka
title: S.M. Siddaiah
